message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $200 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit high for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product for $175. What do you think?
Alice, I really appreciate you coming down to $175, but I'm still not quite there.  My absolute maximum is $150. If you can't go lower, I'll have to look elsewhere.
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'm now offering the product for $170. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
